```cpp
import QtQuick 2.3
import QtQuick.Window 2.2

Window {
  id: mainWindow
  visible: true
  width: 720
  height: 400

  ListView {
    id: categories

    width: 150
    height: parent.height
    orientation: ListView.Vertical
    anchors.top: parent.top
    spacing: 3
  }
}
```

```cpp
import QtQuick 2.3
import QtQuick.Window 2.2
import "qrc:/"

Window {
  id: mainWindow
  visible: true
  width: 720
  height: 400

  Feeds {
    id: categoriesModel
  }

  ListView {
    id: categories

    width: 150
    height: parent.height
    orientation: ListView.Vertical
    anchors.top: parent.top
    spacing: 3
    model:categoriesModel
    delegate: CategoriesDelegate {
      id: categoriesDelegate
      width: categories.width
    }
  }
}
```
